body.name: Shure PGA48 Dynamic Microphone - Handheld Mic for Vocals with Cardioid Pick-up Pattern, Discrete On/Off Switch, 3-pin XLR Connector, 15' XLR-to-XLR Cable, Stand Adapter and Zipper Pouch (PGA48-XLR)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 26 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 14 hrs 26 mins
features: EXCEPTIONAL SOUND CLARITY - The PGA48-XLR features a cardioid polar pattern for excellent sound isolation and feedback rejection, delivering clear and natural sound reproduction.
DYNAMIC MICROPHONE - The dynamic capsule of the PGA48-XLR offers high gain before feedback, making it an excellent choice for vocal performances, speeches, and presenations.
ON/OFF SWITCH - The PGA48-XLR includes and On/Off switch for added convenience and control over audio output.
DURABLE AND RELIABLE - With a rugged metal construction and a steel mesh grille, the PGA48-XLR is designed to withstand the demands of daily use, both on and off the stage.
INTEGRATED SHOCK MOUNT - The integrated shock mount of the PGA48-XLR minimizes handling noise and ensures clear audio reproduction.
TAILORED FREQUENCY RESPONSE - The PGA48-XLR has a tailored frequency response that emphasizes clarity in the mid-range and bass frequencies, delivering warm and natural sound.
EASY SETUP - The PGA48-XLR comes with a 15' XLR cable for easy and convenient connectivity to your sound system, making it an ideal choice for beginners and professionals alike.
WHAT'S IN THE BOX - PGA48 Microphone, 15' XLR-to-XLR Cable, Stand Adapter and Zipper Pouch.
body.description: The PGA48 Dynamic Vocal Microphone is a professional quality microphone featuring highly durable design and construction that delivers excellent sound. Ideal for use in spoken word and karaoke performance, the PGA48 features an on/off switch, swivel adapter, zipper pouch and choice of XLR cable or QTR ( 1/4 ") cable, or without cable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Overview The PGA48 Dynamic Vocal Microphone is a professional quality microphone featuring highly durable design and construction that delivers excellent sound. Ideal for use in spoken word and karaoke performance, the PGA48 features an on/off switch, swivel adapter, zipper pouch and choice of XLR cable or QTR (¼") cable, or without cable. PGA48 Cardioid Dynamic Vocal Microphone Features Tailored microphone cartridge design specifically for clarity in the standard frequency range of speech Cardioid polar pattern picks up audio from the source while rejecting unwanted noise Updated industrial design with black metallic finish and grille featuring classic silver ball grille On/Off switch for discrete control of microphone operation Stand adapter for mounting to a microphone stand Zipper pouch included for additional protection during storage or transport Legendary Shure quality design and construction for exceptional performance in rigorous environments

PG ALTA Microphones: A Tradition of True Sound Shure Microphones have always delivered unmatched sound quality and durability, making them essential for stage performance and studio recording around the world. Tailored for performers of every level, Shure offers a complete family of wired microphones to meet any audio need. With the PG ALTA Microphone family, Shure continues its 90-year tradition of manufacturing audio products of the highest quality and construction. Featuring a sleek black metallic industrial design and cardioid polar patterns that reduce feedback and background noise, the PG ALTA family delivers rock-solid sound and reliability that sets the bar for accessible, professional-caliber gear for performance and recording.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent sound quality but near-floor-level mounting is difficult
reviews.reviewText: I got this microphone to go with my Mackie audio mixer for the purpose of simultaneously recording my voice and game audio with stereo separation. The microphone works very well, but it doesn't seem to have an easy way to mount it to anything that's near floor level (in my case, about 24 inches (60 cm) above the ground). While there are microphone stands, nothing I've seen gets that low (I may have been looking at the wrong things though).Thus, I'd need some handyman type skills to build something that would work, a pair of pieces of metal with rotation points can be used, with a sort of rotating cone-shape part at the end for securing the microphone should allow for it to be mounted. My setup isn't really ideal, however, for voice recording, so I need to make some changes to my computer desk area and build stuff to make it work more optimally, such as pointing away from the background noise instead of toward it. It is a bit on the heavy side though so I do have to take that into account.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for a perfect price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This came in handy during Holiday karaoke ! It has a handy on/off switch which my $100 plus mic does not have and that’s a definite plus when you’re passing the mic around. I swear it made ‘ok’ singers sound better and clearer, lol!It’s better than just a karaoke mic though. It can definitely be used for lead or background vocalists, spoken word, presentations…Nice price point as well.Great purchase !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good inexpensive microphone.
reviews.reviewText: I like thatb this mic come with a new cord also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mic at an Excellent Price
reviews.reviewText: I have a Shure SM7B which I use for the majority of my podcasting, but I had to do a couple of remote, on the spot, interviews so I bought the PGA48 for my guests to use. Wow I am impressed. It's lightweight, and the sound quality is great, especially considering the price. If you're looking for a beginner mic, this is it. You'll get a lot of bang for your buck. In fact, unless you're overly obsessive like me, I see no reason why you wouldn't continue to use this mic well beyond your newbie stage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Dynamic Microphone
reviews.reviewText: I use this mic for my videos where the sound is controlled by my mixer which is plugged into my video camera. The quality of the sound is good according to my wife who hears me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well made and sound is great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used To Amplify Alexa music
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Sure mic to amplify the music from Alexa into a guitar amplifier. It worked great, I can now play along with Alexa thru a guitar amp at greater columns. I recommend this to every musician.
Es un excelente producto, muy buen sonido.
Amei a qualidade desse microfone! Mesmo no volume baixo ainda sim ele tem um som alto e limpo! Shure sempre arrasando
It gives a great voice absorption, clear and strong amplifier. To be recommended.
I like this Microphone. Used on my fender guitar amplifier, it works well. The quality feel solide, the sound is very friendly for singers.
